title: I Became Fuck Buddies With My Friend's Mom
description: One day Hayata comes across writing scrawled on the wall in a public bathroom asking for a "naughty friend". Giving in to his curiosity, he sends a message and they agree to meet up. But to Hayata's surprise, the woman he encounters turns out to be his friend's mom.
author: Karaagechan

1.title: I Became Fuck Buddies With My Friend's Mom
